Hi there!

I study Computer Science at The University of Chicago, and I'm finishing up my BS and MS degrees there this year.

I'm interested in machine learning, graphics, and a bunch of other stuff: image processing, sound generation, robotics, video games, singing, origami, and food - to name a few. I also perform with Voices in Your Head.

Feel free to send me an email if you want to chat, work on something together, or hire me! You can find my resume here.
